db:abstract.db:para: The QWebEngineDownloadItem class provides information about a download.
This class was introduced in Qt 5.5.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: QWebEngineDownloadItem stores the state of a download to be used to manage requested downloads.

db:section.db:title: enum QWebEngineDownloadItem::DownloadState
db:section.db:para: This enum describes the state of the download:

db:td.db:para: Download has been requested, but has not been accepted yet.
Download has been interrupted (by the server or because of lost connectivity).

db:section.db:title: [since 5.8] enum QWebEngineDownloadItem::DownloadType
db:section.db:para: Describes the requested download's type.

db:td.db:para: The web server's response includes a Content-Disposition header with the attachment directive. If Content-Disposition is present in the reply, the web server is indicating that the client should prompt the user to save the content regardless of the content type. See RFC 2616 section 19.5.1 for details.
The user clicked a link with the download attribute. See HTML download attribute for details.
The user initiated the download, for example by selecting a web action.
Saving of the current page was requested (for example by the QWebEnginePage::SavePage web action).

db:section.db:para: This enum was introduced in Qt 5.8.

db:section.db:title: [since 5.7] enum QWebEngineDownloadItem::SavePageFormat
db:section.db:para: This enum describes the format that is used to save a web page.

db:td.db:para: This is not a request for downloading a complete web page.
The page is saved as a single HTML page. Resources such as images are not saved.
The page is saved as a complete HTML page, for example a directory containing the single HTML page and the resources.
The page is saved as a complete web page in the MIME HTML format.

db:section.db:para: This enum was introduced in Qt 5.7.

db:section.db:title: void QWebEngineDownloadItem::accept()
db:section.db:para: Accepts the current download request, which will start the download.

db:section.db:title: void QWebEngineDownloadItem::cancel()
db:section.db:para: Cancels the current download.

db:section.db:title: quint32 QWebEngineDownloadItem::id() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the download item's ID.

db:section.db:title: bool QWebEngineDownloadItem::isFinished() const
db:section.db:para: Returns whether this download is finished (not in progress).

db:section.db:title: [since 5.6] QString QWebEngineDownloadItem::mimeType() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the MIME type of the download.
This function was introduced in Qt 5.6.

db:section.db:title: QString QWebEngineDownloadItem::path() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the full target path where data is being downloaded to.
The path includes the file name. The default suggested path is the standard download location and file name is deduced not to overwrite already existing files.

db:section.db:title: qint64 QWebEngineDownloadItem::receivedBytes() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the amount of data in bytes that has been downloaded so far.
-1 means the size is unknown.

db:section.db:title: [since 5.7] QWebEngineDownloadItem::SavePageFormat QWebEngineDownloadItem::savePageFormat() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the format the web page will be saved in if this is a download request for a web page.
This function was introduced in Qt 5.7.

db:section.db:title: void QWebEngineDownloadItem::setPath(QString path)
db:section.db:para: Sets the full target path to download the file to.

The path should also include the file name. The download path can only be set in response to the QWebEngineProfile::downloadRequested() signal before the download is accepted. Past that point, this function has no effect on the download item's state.

db:section.db:title: [since 5.7] void QWebEngineDownloadItem::setSavePageFormat(QWebEngineDownloadItem::SavePageFormat format)
db:section.db:para: Sets the format the web page will be saved in if this is a download request for a web page.
This function was introduced in Qt 5.7.

db:section.db:title: QWebEngineDownloadItem::DownloadState QWebEngineDownloadItem::state() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the download item's current state.

db:section.db:title: qint64 QWebEngineDownloadItem::totalBytes() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the the total amount of data to download in bytes.
-1 means the size is unknown.

db:section.db:title: [since 5.8] QWebEngineDownloadItem::DownloadType QWebEngineDownloadItem::type() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the requested download's type.
This function was introduced in Qt 5.8.

db:section.db:title: QUrl QWebEngineDownloadItem::url() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the download's origin URL.
